medical_history.chief_complaint: Recurrent UTI refractory to antibiotic therapy.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient presented with recurrent urinary tract infections that were not responsive to antibiotic treatment. History indicates a colovesical fistula likely secondary to diverticular disease. Last colonoscopy revealed diverticulosis.
medical_history.family_history: Denies family history of colon cancer or inflammatory bowel disease.
